org.gradle.process

Interface ExecSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseExecSpec, ProcessForkOptions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Exec

    public interface ExecSpec
extends BaseExecSpec
    Specified the options for executing some command.

    • Method Summary
